digMiss: This spot was a bust, huh? I'm sure there's treasure around here somewhere. Once you've rested up, try another place, or maybe another time of day. Maybe it's here and the tides are hiding it; maybe it's just somewhere else. Maybe both! Many hands make light work, you know.
digHit: You've done it! That's quite a haul you found down there. As promised, here's a Pair of Pants for you, but I'm going to need a lot of help carrying all of this gold back to our trove. Tell the rest of the crew! Now that you've found the treasure, there's no need for the others to come at any specific time, as long as they come to the right place! There's Pairs of Pants for everyone that lends a hand. It'll probably take until Sunday to carry all of this back.
